saying: Keep your crumbs out of the bed.
description: Plucky is a chicken villager from the Animal Crossing series. Her name comes from the word "pluck," meaning "to pull out feathers when preparing a bird for food." When she debuted in Animal Crossing, she was a peppy islander. After Doubutsu no Mori e+, Plucky would be absent from any Animal Crossing series media until she made an appearance in Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo, this time as a sisterly villager.
